participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and optimistic, Emily loves spending time with her family and tries to make the best of any situation.
participant_1.background: I'm not an excellent cook, but I do my best to make meals that my mom enjoys. My job at the gas station is going well, but I'm having trouble keeping up with my schoolwork. I was bullied for being overweight as a child. I stopped by my local sushi bar on my way home from work to pick up a delicious meal. I work in the pharmaceutical industry.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and thoughtful, Jake tends to overanalyze situations but loves to share joyful moments with his pets.
participant_2.background: I got injured while running and had to stop for a few weeks. I have the best dogs in the world and I would brag about them to my friends if I was famous. I overanalyze things and dwell on small mistakes. My brother works at Best Buy. I live in Colorado.

content.text: I am pretty good, thank you!  I just got home from work.  How are you?
I am well.  I am on break from school.  I am glad you are having a good day!
Thanks!  It is a beautiful day out today.  I am glad you are having a break from school.  Are you enjoying it?
Yes, I am enjoying my break.  I am going to the dog park later today.
That sounds fun!  I love dogs.  I have a dog at home.  What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a goldendoodle and a terrier mix.  They are the best dogs in the world!
That sounds awesome!  I would love to see a picture of them sometime.
I would love to show you a picture!  I will text you a picture later.
Great!  I look forward to seeing them.
Me too!  You have a great day!
